AUTHOR: PookaMustard
INSTALL_MSG: Bing cog installed. To start, use [b]help Bing. You can also set [p]bingsetadult [channel/server] to allow for searches without SafeSearch enabled.
NAME: Bing
SHORT: Bing cog that searches Bing for web, images, videos and news.
DESCRIPTION: Bing cog that searches Bing for web, images, videos and news, with a larger focus on image search. Requires Python module py-bing-search to work, and API key from the Azure Marketplace.
